mapper.select:
SELECT ec.id as id, ec.title as title, ec.price as price, ec.lesson_num as lessonNum, ec.cover as cover, et.name as teacherName , es1.title as subjectLevelOne, es2.title as subjectLevelTwo from edu_course as ec LEFT JOIN edu_course_description as ecd ON ec.id = ecd.id LEFT JOIN edu_teacher as et ON ec.teacher_id = et.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject es1 ON ec.subject_id = es1.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject es2 on ec.subject_parent_id = es2.id
where ec.id = #{courseId}
